tit.e: Takayama Chikurin Park (a bamboo grove park in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture)
Takayama Chikurin Park (a bamboo grove park in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 高山竹林園（たかやまちくりんえん）は、奈良県生駒市にある庭園である。
sen.e: Takayama Chikurin Park is a garden located in Ikoma City Nara Prefecture.
Takayama Chikurin Park is a garden located in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.
sen.cmt: カンマを補足しました。
sen.e: Takayama Chikurin Park is a garden located in Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 奈良県高山茶筌生産協同組合が、地場産業（茶筅などの竹製の茶器製造）の振興のためにつくられたもので、茶筅製作の実演などがある。
sen.e: it was established for Takayama tea-whisk manufacturers' cooperative association, Nara Prefecture to promote a local industry (Manufacture of bamboo Chaki (tea utensils) including tea-whisk) and holds demonstrations of manufacturing tea-whisks.

It was established for Takayama Tea-whisk Manufacturers' Cooperative Association, Nara Prefecture to promote a local industry (Manufacture of bamboo Chaki [tea utensils] including tea-whisk) and holds demonstrations of manufacturing tea-whisks.

It was established for Takayama Tea-whisk Manufacturers' Cooperative Association, Nara Prefecture to promote a local industry (Manufacture of bamboo Chaki [tea utensils] including tea-whisk) and holds demonstrations of manufacturing tea-whisks.

sen.j: 所在地：奈良県生駒市高山町3440
sen.e: Address: 3440 Takayama-cho, Ikoma City, Nara Prefecture
